text: Duggie Brown (born Barry Dudley; 7 August 1940 â€“ 16 August 2022) was an English comedian and actor. He was born in Rotherham, England. His career began in 1969. He played the Milkman in the movie Kes and George Freeman in the soap opera Coronation Street. Brown died on 16 August 2022, nine days after his 82nd birthday. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:Comedians from Yorkshire
title: Duggie Brown
